attributes.action: Investigate the RSPCA on animal cruelty, suffering and unnecessary deaths of dogs and cats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
RSPCA prime objective is not to save animals but to make money they kill 10,000s of dogs and Cats for no reason other than they cost money to look after. 

I do not except this as they are there to help animals.

Please sign if you want your animals to be looked after in any event that you cannot look after them.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
